actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to allow State manufacturing extension partnerships to award grants to small and medium sized manufacturers for the purpose of training new workers to replace departing experienced workers.
short_title: Retain Innovation and Manufacturing Excellence (RIME) Act of 2018

summary.text:
Retain Innovation and Manufacturing Excellence (RIME) Act of 2018

This bill directs the Department of Commerce to establish a pilot grant program to help eligible manufacturers retain retiring employees for up to 90 days for the purpose of transferring job-specific skills to other employees.
